job.title: Jr. Software Engineer
job.industry: Hospital & Health Care,Information Technology and Services
job.description: <p>We are looking for a Backend Software Engineer to join our Integrations team. Offering $30/hr. on a 6-month Contract (w/ ability for perm conversion).</p><p><br></p><p>Minimum Qualifications:</p><p><br></p><p>Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or related field</p><p>Proficiency with software development</p><p>Familiarity with agile principles like continuous build, test, integration, and deployment</p><p><br></p><p>Preferred Qualifications:</p><p><br></p><p>2+ years’ experience as a member of a software development team</p><p>Skilled knowledge and experience developing and maintaining data communication systems and architecture</p><p>Ability to develop and troubleshoot data flow processes, translation maps</p><p>Knowledge of Web Services, RESTful API development</p><p>Experience with GoLang or another programming language</p><p>Experience with cloud development with AWS, Azure, or other cloud providers is a plus</p><p>Knowledge of relational databases, PostgreSQL or other relational</p><p>Experience with Docker and development of containerized applications</p><p>Familiarity with FHIR and healthcare interoperability standards is a plus</p>
